description: Disable Microsoft Office Security Features by registry Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Disable Microsoft Office Security Features
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Office\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*VBAWarnings OR *DisableInternetFilesInPV OR *DisableUnsafeLocationsInPV OR *DisableAttachementsInPV) AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000001\)")
